description.desc1: Produces shaders for high quality rendering that automatically adapt to texture inputs and the number of active lights.

Material file.descript: load a material file (needs to be in the MaxMSP-Jitter Material format)

diffuse model.descript:
Diffuse shading model: 
	<li>'lambert' (Lambertian diffuse shading)
	<li>'oren_nayer' (Oren-Nayer diffuse shading)
	<li>'toon' (Toon diffuse shading) 
	<li>'minnaert' (Minnaert diffuse shading)

diffuse size.descript: Diffuse toon component size. Only valid when the diffuse shading model is toon.

diffuse smooth.descript: Diffuse toon component smoothness. Only valid when the diffuse shading model is toon.

diffuse darkness.descript: Material darkness. Only valid when the diffuse shading model is minnaert.

specular model.descript:
Specular shading model : 
	<li>'blinn' (Blinn specular shading) 
	<li>'phong' (Phong specular shading)
	<li>'toon' (Toon specular shading)
	<li>'ward' (Ward specular shading)
	<li>'cook_torrance' (Cook-Torrance specular shading)

specular size.descript: Specular toon component size. Only valid when the specular shading model is toon.

specular smooth.descript: Specular toon component smoothness. Only valid when the specular shading model is toon.

fog.descript:
Fog type: 
	<li>'none' (No fog) 
	<li>'linear' (Linear fog)
	<li>'exp' (Exponential fog) 
	<li>'exp2' (Squared exponential fog)

lighting.descript: lets the model react to light sources

shadow eps.descript: Shadow epsilon (eps) modifies the shape of shadows, and corrects self-shadowing error (default = 0.2). This value is used when the bound object is a shadow-receiver.

shadow radius.descript: Adjust shadow blur radius (default = 0.3). This value is used when the bound object is a shadow-receiver.

shadow hard.descript: Adjust shadow hardness (default = 0.7). This value is used when the bound object is a shadow-receiver.

shadow soft.descript: Adjust shadow softness (default = 0.3). Overwrites shadow_radius and shadow_hard properties. This value is used when the bound object is a shadow-receiver.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
